# canvasViewDidFinishRendering(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate that the previously drawn content is ready to display.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func canvasViewDidFinishRendering(_ canvasView: PKCanvasView)
```

## Parameters

- **canvasView**: The canvas view whose contents changed.

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKCanvasView] object calls this method when you assign a new drawing to its [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKCanvasView/drawing] property, when the user zooms in on the canvas, or when the canvas scrolls.

## Responding to drawing-related changes

- **canvasViewDrawingDidChange(_:)**: Tells the delegate that the contents of the current drawing changed.
